transcript:
the older I get the more I realize how
important it is to be grateful for
everything that I already have and to
stop crying for what I don't have look
around you and realize how much you have
to be grateful for realize how much
you've actually been blessed in your
life some people would kill to have your
life when you focus on gratitude God
will bless you with more to be grateful
for
